summary: THE ENGINE SIMPLY STOPS WITHOUT WARNING.  I HAD TAKEN IT TO DEALER AND THEY COULDN'T FIND ANYTHING WRONG.  FOUR DAYS LATER WHILE DRIVING TO THE DEALER IT DIED ON A 6 LANE STREET.  I WAS IN OUR OTHER VEHICLE AND TOWED IT TO THE DEALER MYSELF.  IT HAS BEEN 6 DAYS AND I HAVE NOT HEARD FROM THEM.  *JB
